title: U.S. sulfur dioxide emissions 1970 to 2017
yAxis: Volume of emissions in thousand tons
summary: In general Volume of emissions in thousand tons has fallen over the Year.

Volume of emissions in thousand tons is roughly decreasing from 1970 to 1980, roughly constant from 1980 to 1990, gradually decreasing from 1990 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1990 and 1995.
Maximum Volume of emissions in thousand tons, about 31218.0 was reported at Year 1970
Minimum Volume of emissions in thousand tons about 2960.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Volume of emissions in thousand tons has decreased over the Year.

Volume of emissions in thousand tons is roughly decreasing from 1970 to 1980, roughly constant from 1980 to 1990, gradually decreasing from 1990 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2016.
